column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Sokka says : " Hey , Dock .
#Text=I 'm Xu !
#Text=Dock 's my brother .
#Text=" Aang says : " But we just saw you .
#Text=You 're even wearing the same clothes .
#Text=The only difference is your hat .
#Text=" Xu says : " Dock works on the docks .
#Text=That 's why we call him , " Dock " , and I work in the shop , that 's why they call me , " Xu " !
#Text=" Aang says : " I do n't get it .
#Text=" Xu says : " Me neither .
#Text=What I can getcha ?
#Text=Hey , I 'll give you a special deal .
#Text=If you buy three fish , I 'll give you a clam for free .
#Text=" Sokka says : " We 'll just take the fish .
#Text=Mind telling your brother we need a ride back to shore ?
#Text=" Dock says : " Hey , colonials !
#Text=My brother says you need a lift .
#Text=" Little boy says : " Can you spare some food ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I wish I could help more .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Our detour into town today has completely thrown off our schedule .
#Text=It 's gon na take some serious finagling to get us back on track .
#Text=" Toph says : " Finagle away , oh schedule master .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , for starters , it looks like we 'll need to wake up forty - three minutes earlier every day .
#Text=" Katara says : " Forty - three minutes ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Look , we only have a few weeks to get to the Fire Lord in time for the invasion and the eclipse , which , by the way , only lasts for eight minutes .
#Text=And we just lost a whole day .
#Text=So if we want to make up the time and stay on schedule , we have to wake up early !
#Text=" Toph says : " Well I 'm not waking up early .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Or we could just cut out all of our eating breaks .
#Text=" Aang says : " What ?
#Text=" Katara says : " No way !
#Text=" Toph says : " Forget it !
#Text=" Sokka says : " I got it , how 's this from now on , we 'll take food breaks and potty breaks at the same time .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , it might be gross , but it 's efficient .
#Text=Either way , we have to leave here first thing tomorrow morning .
#Text=" Aang says : " What 's the matter Katara ?
#Text=" Katara says : " I think Appa 's sick .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=Appa 's sick ?
#Text=That 's awful !
#Text=" Toph says : " Wow , Sokka , I did n't realize you cared so much .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Of course I care .
#Text=I might as well just throw our schedule away now .
#Text=And I 'm concerned because my big , furry friend does n't feel well .
#Text=" Toph says : " He must have gotten sick from being in the polluted water .
#Text=" Aang says : " He does n't look sick .
#Text=You okay , buddy ?
#Text=His tongue is purple !
#Text=That ca n't be good .
#Text=Katara , can you heal him ?
#Text=" Katara says : " It looks like he needs some medicine .
#Text=Maybe we can find the right herbs in town .
#Text=" Toph says : " Is it just me , or does this place seem different ?
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , are the people ... happier ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hey , Xu , what 's going on with everyone today ?
#Text=" Xu says : " Ah , something amazing happened last night .
#Text=Food was delivered to our village by a mysterious and wonderful person ... the Painted Lady .
#Text=" Katara says : " The Painted who now ?
#Text=" Xu says : " The Painted Lady .
#Text=She 's part of our town 's lore .
#Text=They say she 's a river spirit who watches over our town in times of need .
#Text=I always thought she was just a legend .
#Text=Until now .
#Text=" Sokka says : " See , we do n't need to help these people , they already have someone to help them .
#Text=All we need is medicine for our sick friend .
#Text=" Xu says : " Medicine ?
#Text=Sorry , all the medicine we have goes to the factory .
#Text=That 's why there 's so many sick people in our village .
#Text=" Katara says : " Looks like we need to stay another night so Appa can rest .
#Text=" Sokka says : " I guess you 're right .
#Text=You got any more food to sell ?
#Text=" Xu says : " Would you like the one - headed fish , or the two - headed fish ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Two - headed !
#Text=What ?
#Text=You get more for your money that way !
#Text=" Little boy says : " Thank you , Painted Lady .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Hi , Dock .
#Text=Is Xu around ?
#Text=" Dock / Xu says : " Let me check ... Hey there !
#Text=Back again , are ya ?
#Text=" Toph says : " We need more food .
#Text=Our friend is still sick and we ca n't leave until he 's better .
#Text=" Xu says : " Oh , well , that 's too bad .
#Text=Maybe if you guys are lucky , the Painted Lady will visit you in the night , and heal your friend .
#Text=" Sokka says : " And maybe she 'll cook us a midnight snack , and we 'll all have a sing - along .
#Text=" Xu says : " Yeah , maybe !
#Text=You know , last night she visited us again .
#Text=Healed most of our sick folks .
#Text=" Aang says : " Is that why this place seems so festive ?
#Text=" Dock says : " Yep , it 's all because of the Painted Lady .
#Text=" Katara says : " Can you believe how much an entire village can be affected by one lady I mean ... spirit ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Well , I hope she returns every night .
#Text=Otherwise this place would go right back to the way it was .
#Text=" Katara says : " Why would you say that ?
#Text=Look how much better off these people are .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Yeah , now , but without her they would n't be able to fend for themselves .
#Text=If she really wanted to help , she would use her spirit magic to blow up that factory .
#Text=" Aang says : " Spirit magic does n't work that way , Sokka .
#Text=It 's more like ... " Aang and Sokka says : " Wooooooooo ... "
